answers.answer: Could this be related to eating? Pain on the right side under the ribs and radiating up to the shoulder and Back could be Gall Bladder Attack and seems to come on an hour or two after eating Fatty Food, there is a list of foods to eat that dont cause this,  low blood sugar(not Diabetes) can make you dizzy and light headed and then you feel better if you eat Carbs. question: Does Anyone have severe dizziness/lightheadedness that accompanies their pain. I am actually becoming more concerned with the lightheadedness than the pain. Yesterday I actually ended up at U of P ER because of an episode where I actually felt I was going to loose consciousness. There was a heat like sensation up the back of my neck into my head and I immediately began to sweat and get clammy. Has anyone had this? Someone mentioned Addison's Disease but I don't have the darkening of skin that most get. My cortisol level was somewhat low...but needs to be retested as I did not get an early am blood draw which is required. After the dizzy episode, I immediately had an exacerbation of the burning symptoms in the lower right quadrant that persisted all night. THis am I am still somewhat lightheaded but the pain has calmed to some degree. Anyone else have this?
title: Severe Dizziness Accompanies Right Quad. Pain
